title: PlayStation VR 2 Costs HOW MUCH?! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 11.02.22
description:
PlayStation VR 2 officially gets a price and release date, Embracer shuts down Square Enix Montreal, and more on this jam packed episode with Blessing and Greg.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:02:35 - Housekeeping

Barrett's God of War Special Presentation is OUT NOW! Join him as he looks back at Kratos' entire journey so far to answer the question, "Can Kratos Be Better?" Watch it and get hyped for God of War Ragnarok RIGHT NOW on YouTube.com/KindaFunnyGames!

SPEAKING OF GOD OF WAR: Tomorrow is our God of War Ragnarok review. We’re going live at 9am right here with a Gamescast (meaning no KFGD). And then later in the day we’re recording PS I Love You XOXO to answer all of your burning questions.

If you missed it, Greg revealed the first details about Ghostbusters: Rise of the Ghost Lord and Mike carved pumpkins on Monday’s Kinda Funny Halloween stream. It was like a Halloween party that was partially sponsored by Ghostbusters VR and partially sponsored by embarrassing stories from Kevin's Halloween party. Check it out on youtube.com/kindafunnygames!

The Roper Report  -

00:07:40 - PlayStation VR 2’s Release Date and Price have been Revealed
00:15:14 - Sony Announces 11 New PlayStation VR2 Games
00:40:23 - Ad
00:43:16 - Embracer shuts down Square Enix Montreal (or should I say, Onoma studio shut down!.. I know, too soon)
00:49:40 - A new Deus Ex is reportedly on the way!
00:54:27 - EA says its Marvel Deal was driven by its success with Star Wars
00:58:17 - Atomic Heart finally has a release date
00:59:12 - Blizzard is Removing Another Hero from Overwatch 2 Due to Bugs
00:59:45 - The Last of Us HBO date is now official
01:00:19 - Naughty Dog Announces The Last of Us Tabletop Game
01:01:45 - Out today
01:05:08 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: NO GAMES DAILY! LIVE 9AM GOD OF WAR REVIEW!!
